name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In Handan, Hebei, a young man chose to park his car on the road and hanged himself.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, Army Day, 30,000 netizens collectively paid tribute to the Kuomintang soldiers under a video of the Communist Party vs. the Kuomintang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that a beef farm in Qiji Town, Liaocheng City, Shandong Province, had found anthrax cases, the county hospital was sealed off, and the infected meat had been circulated in the market. An official notice circulated online stated that on July 27, four animal anthrax positives were found.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 1, Chongqing. A man reported Xiushan County Yujiao Jingfeng Food Co., Ltd. under his real name. The reporter said that the company was responsible for the distribution of nutritious meals to all primary and secondary schools and kindergartens in the county. From September 2022 to June 2023, the pork distributed included low-quality pork such as frozen pork and spoiled meat. 
Xiushan County Education Committee: A special team was formed to conduct an investigation.
